publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3773 Alex Fergusson: Visit of David Cameron MP—That the Parliament applauds the visit to Holyrood on 20 December 2005 by David Cameron MP, Leader of the Her Majesty’s Opposition; congratulates the First Minister on his foresight in agreeing to a meeting to discuss future relations with a Conservative government at Westminster; notes that there has been no visit to the Scottish Parliament building by the Rt Hon Tony Blair MP, and invites the Prime Minister to visit Holyrood within the remaining period of his term in office.
